Utils Preferences Module¶

Module to load preferences.

class proteus.utils.preferences.Preferences¶

Class to load settings from registry.

static load_all(main: QMainWindow) → QSettings¶
Parameters:

main – Main Window.

Returns:

QSettings class.

static load_language(main: QMainWindow, language: str) → None¶

Method that load the language.

Parameters:

  • main – Main window.

  • language – Language.

static load_theme(main: QMainWindow, theme: str) → None¶

Method that load the theme.

Parameters:

  • main – Main window.

  • theme – Theme.

class proteus.utils.preferences.PreferencesDialog(parent)¶

Dialog to change preferences.

load_preferences() → None¶

Method that load preferences from the settings.

select_archetypes_path()¶

Method that select the path of the archetypes, save it in the settings and in the config file, as well as in the input path field.

update_preferences() → None¶

Method that update the preferences.
